Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with a distillation column (SOFC-DIS) has been proposed in this article.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: The integrated SOFC system consists of a distillation column, an EtOH/H2O heater, an air heater, an anode preheater, a reformer, an SOFC stack and an afterburner.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: Bioethanol with 5 mol% ethanol was purified in a distillation column to obtain a desired concentration necessary for SOFC operation.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: The SOFC stack was operated under isothermal conditions.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: The heat generated from the stack and the afterburner was supplied to the reformer and three heaters.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: The net remaining heat from the SOFC system (Q(SOFC,Net)) was then provided to the reboiler of the distillation column.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: The effects of fuel utilization and operating voltage on the net energy (Q(Net)), Which equals Q(SOFC,Net) minus the distillation energy (Q(D)), were examined.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: It was found that the system could become more energy sufficient when operating at lower fuel utilization or lower voltage but at the expense of less electricity produced.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: Moreover, it was found that there were some operating conditions, which yielded Q(Net) of zero.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: At this point, the integrated system provides the maximum electrical power without requiring an additional heat source.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: The effects of ethanol concentration and ethanol recovery on the electrical performance at zero Q(Net) for different fuel utilizations were investigated.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit

Sentencas: With the appropriate operating conditions (e.g. C-EtOH = 41 %, U-f = 80% and EtOH recovery = 80%), the overall electrical efficiency and power density are 33.3% (LHV) and 0.32 W cm(-2), respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic assessment of solid oxide fuel cell system integrated with bioethanol purification unit
